name: Floppy Pipe
description:
A reimagining of the famous "Floppy Bird". The rules are simple: you are a Flying Pipe and you have to avoid the chickens as long as you can!
Controls: click with the mouse or press spacebar to fly up!
That's all!

You can also find our game on the Play Store

Support us with a little donation, or by voiting our games on Kongregate
